column4: anyone familiar with mediamonkey on windows? I'm looking for an app that can auto tag ID3 and auto the path based on the id3
for tagging, mp3tag is quite useful but you will often have to choose atleast something yourself. but you can make it auto tag from nearly anything if you want it enough :>
can I use that to search for an album on say amazon and apply that album to a directory of mp3s?
